title: URF on the Monday as well?
body: Seeing that it's a public holiday for ANZAC day, is it possible for us the keep URF through into the Monday?

replies.body:
lmao no we dont, fuck other regions.
we didn't get a proper server skin, we deserve an extra day of urf tbh.
Probably not, we have to consider other regions.
Most likely not, as it would be unfair to the other regions.
